casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Justin Everett ROSE. No. 296P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 3, 2005. Samuel L. Bridges, for Justin Everett Rose. G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of June 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of June 2005."
